name: Loot
introduce: Loot is a collaborative media project consisting of 8,000 NFTs full of words that depict “randomized adventurer gear”. Loot aims to create a decentralized, infinitely-expansive sci-fantasy universe, rich with stories, games and multi-media. The Lootverse is a collection of NFT projects, games, art, stories and multimedia backed by an active community of players, builders, artists, writers and creators.
